description: Jadoo comes to know about her mom`s past. She was very pretty and her first love was an owner of an orchard. He seemed really nice too. Jadoo wonders why mom got married to her dad and not him. Jadoo`s grandmother visits Jadoo`s, and scolds her for having bad habits.

titles.title: 그런 슬픈 눈으로 보지 말아요 / 할머니는 무서워
